top_comments.comment: Parents should ABSOLUTELY have a say in their childs education.  The government is NOT your friend and they need to stay out of the curriculum being taught because their curriculum is anti American racist nonsense.  Our kids are our future and they need to learn to read, write, and do math, along with life skills they will need to succeed.  Teaching them to be racists will not accomplish anything but fuel the hatred being taught. Kids don't see color, they see other kids.
GO YOUNGER  HOPE THE DEMOCRATS  DON'T  TAMPERING WITH THE ELECTION  IF THEY DO PRISON  IS THE WAY NO FREE PASS LIKE CLINTON'S, OBAMA, HUNTER  MILLEY, FACCI,OMAR  PELOSI
Youngkin will win hands down. If dems dont cheat.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Please run the story about the Dems showing up at Youngkin’s rally as white supremacists.  This is a red flag that this election will be in danger of voter fraud.  It is also what happened on Jan. 6.  Make the connection and you will know who really won the 2020 election.  Nor, I would bet, were these Dems Virginians.  Voter ID and Chain of Custody is essential, otherwise, surprise!  These fakers should face treason charges.
